bill.summary: 3/17/1998--Passed House amended. Amends the Occupational Safety and Health Act of 1970 (OSHA) to prohibit the Secretary of Labor from using the results of enforcement activities, such as the number of citations issued or penalties assessed, to: (1) evaluate employees directly involved in OSHA enforcement activities; or (2) impose quotas or goals with regard to the results of such activities.
